title: 5 Shoes That Our Celeb Fam Is Currently Crushing On
text:
facebook 
Anytime is the right time for a footwear overhaul. Lot’s been said (or is being said, as you read this) about the inescapable impact of wearing good shoes. You’d agree that an outfit doesn’t feel like one till your feet slip into a pair that’s worth the dough. So, no arguments here! It’s time for a season update, and what better place to peek into for inspiration than Bollywood. Before it’s spring (and you pack away a third of your favourite shoes), let’s look at what kicks on the feet of our homegirls 1.Thigh-High Mules 
The thigh-high boots-meets-mules gets a definite nod of approval from Maliaka Arora Khan. The hot mom pairs her hybrid footwear with leather pants, and the classic sweater-over-shirt combo. Get this pair if freezing your toes off is no biggie (or if you live in Bombay). A photo posted by @afashionistasdiaries on Jan 12, 2017 at 10:02am PST 2.Metallic pointed-toe pumps 
If your love for metallic is strong, but sporting the trend in your outfit rings as a tad OTT, proclaim your love via footwear. Tamannah shows how the metallic pair can emerge as the real MVP of any outfit. A photo posted by @afashionistasdiaries on Jan 10, 2017 at 8:37am PST 3.The Anything-But-White Sneaker 
Yes, the white-sneaker is the OG player in footwear. But too much of a kind is bad for your sartorial palette. Out with the white, and in with the many colours that beautiful sneaker offers. Like this Tumblr-pink sported by Parineeti Chopra, here, with her cute denim shirt. A photo posted by @afashionistasdiaries on Jan 11, 2017 at 6:11pm PST 4.The School Girl Shoes 
This all-too familiar shoe is the best fashion throwback that you can flaunt in your next brunch outfit, or for your big interview. Kalki’s pussy-bow Gucci dress gets the best companion in these back-to-school shoes. Pick a pair in black or white to keep things fashionably nostalgic. A photo posted by @afashionistasdiaries on Jan 12, 2017 at 9:06pm PST 5.Suede Ankle-Length Boots 
They could be your next travel companion or Monday footwear. The suede ankle-high boots are posing as a strong contender for comfort footwear, specially the low-heeled ones. Shilpa Shetty chooses the footwear for her jetseetting shenanigans. A photo posted by @afashionistasdiaries on Jan 6, 2017 at 2:41am PST
